languages.text: "{mf|Господин|Госпожа} фон Валанциус, мои приветствия! Да пребудет свет предвечной {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терры{/g}!" {n}Молодой человек отвешивает вам безупречно учтивый поклон. Затем выпрямляется и смотрит прямо — без вызова, но со спокойной уверенностью, как смотрят только на равных.{/n} "Эвейн Винтерскейл, младший сын Каллигоса Винтерскейла. К вашим услугам".

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Господин|Госпожа} фон Валанциус, мои приветствия! Да пребудет свет предвечной {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терры{/g}!" {n}Молодой человек отвешивает вам безупречно учтивый поклон. Затем выпрямляется и смотрит прямо — без вызова, но со спокойной уверенностью, как смотрят только на равных.{/n} "Эвейн Винтерскейл, младший сын Каллигоса Винтерскейла. К вашим услугам".

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, my greetings! May the light of eternal {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} shine forevermore!" {n}The young man before you offers an impeccably courteous bow. He then straightens his back and looks you in the eye, not as a show of defiance, but with cool confidence. It is a gaze with which one graces an equal.{/n} "Evayne Winterscale, younger son of Calligos Winterscale. At your service."
languages.original_text: "{mf|Господин|Госпожа} фон Валанциус, мои приветствия! Затем выпрямляется и смотрит прямо — без вызова, но со спокойной уверенностью, как смотрят только на равных.{/n} "Эвейн Винтерскейл, младший сын Каллигоса Винтерскейла. К вашим услугам".

May the light of the eternal {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} shine forevermore!" {n}The young man before you offers you an impeccably courteous bow. Then he straightens his back and looks you in the eye, not as a show of defiance, but with calm confidence. It is the way one looks at their equal.{/n} "Evayne Winterscale, younger son of Calligos Winterscale. At your service."

"{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, my greetings! May the light of eternal {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} shine forevermore!" {n}The young man before you offers an impeccably courteous bow. He then straightens his back and looks you in the eye, not as a show of defiance, but with cool confidence. It is a gaze with which one graces an equal.{/n} "Evayne Winterscale, younger son of Calligos Winterscale. At your service."

languages.text: «¡Saludos, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius! ¡Que la luz de la eterna {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} brille por siempre jamás!». {n}El joven que tienes ante ti te hace una reverencia impecablemente cortés. Luego endereza su espalda y te mira a los ojos, no como un gesto de desafío, sino con una confianza tranquila. Es una mirada con la que uno honra a un igual.{/n} «Evayne Winterscale, hijo menor de Calligos Winterscale. A su servicio».
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, my greetings! May the light of eternal {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} shine forevermore!" {n}The young man before you offers an impeccably courteous bow. He then straightens his back and looks you in the eye, not as a show of defiance, but with cool confidence. It is a gaze with which one graces an equal.{/n} "Evayne Winterscale, younger son of Calligos Winterscale. At your service."

traits.locale_text: «¡Saludos, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius! ¡Que la luz de la eterna {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} brille por siempre jamás!». {n}El joven que tienes ante ti te hace una reverencia impecablemente cortés. Luego endereza su espalda y te mira a los ojos, no como un gesto de desafío, sino con una confianza tranquila. Es una mirada con la que uno honra a un igual.{/n} «Evayne Winterscale, hijo menor de Calligos Winterscale. A su servicio».

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, seid gegrüßt! Möge das Licht des ewigen {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} für alle Zeiten scheinen!" {n}Der junge Mann vor dir verneigt sich makellos höflich vor dir. Dann richtet er sich auf und blickt dir in die Augen, nicht aus Trotz, sondern mit kühlem Selbstbewusstsein. Es ist ein Blick, mit dem man Ebenbürtige ehrt.{/n} "Evayne Winterzunder, der jüngere Sohn von Calligos Winterzunder. Zu Euren Diensten."
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, my greetings! May the light of eternal {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} shine forevermore!" {n}The young man before you offers an impeccably courteous bow. He then straightens his back and looks you in the eye, not as a show of defiance, but with cool confidence. It is a gaze with which one graces an equal.{/n} "Evayne Winterscale, younger son of Calligos Winterscale. At your service."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, seid gegrüßt! Möge das Licht des ewigen {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} für alle Zeiten scheinen!" {n}Der junge Mann vor dir verneigt sich makellos höflich vor dir. Dann richtet er sich auf und blickt dir in die Augen, nicht aus Trotz, sondern mit kühlem Selbstbewusstsein. Es ist ein Blick, mit dem man Ebenbürtige ehrt.{/n} "Evayne Winterzunder, der jüngere Sohn von Calligos Winterzunder. Zu Euren Diensten."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Dame} von Valancius, bonjour ! Puisse la lumière de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} l'éternelle briller à tout jamais ! »{n}Le jeune homme devant vous vous adresse une révérence parfaite, puis se redresse pour vous regarder droit dans les yeux, non pas en signe de défi, mais avec une confiance assurée, comme s'il était votre égal.{/n} « Evayne Winterscale, benjamin de Calligos Winterscale. Pour vous servir. »
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, my greetings! May the light of eternal {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} shine forevermore!" {n}The young man before you offers an impeccably courteous bow. He then straightens his back and looks you in the eye, not as a show of defiance, but with cool confidence. It is a gaze with which one graces an equal.{/n} "Evayne Winterscale, younger son of Calligos Winterscale. At your service."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Dame} von Valancius, bonjour ! Puisse la lumière de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} l'éternelle briller à tout jamais ! »{n}Le jeune homme devant vous vous adresse une révérence parfaite, puis se redresse pour vous regarder droit dans les yeux, non pas en signe de défi, mais avec une confiance assurée, comme s'il était votre égal.{/n} « Evayne Winterscale, benjamin de Calligos Winterscale. Pour vous servir. »

languages.text: “向您致意，冯·瓦兰修斯大人！愿永恒的{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}泰拉{/g}光辉长存！”{n}你面前的年轻人彬彬有礼地向你鞠了一躬。随后，他挺起肩背，直视着你的眼睛。他的举止没有丝毫蔑视，而是充满了沉着与自信，这是直视平等之人的目光。{/n}“卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的幼子，艾维尼·温特斯凯尔，为您效劳。”
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, my greetings! May the light of eternal {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} shine forevermore!" {n}The young man before you offers an impeccably courteous bow. He then straightens his back and looks you in the eye, not as a show of defiance, but with cool confidence. It is a gaze with which one graces an equal.{/n} "Evayne Winterscale, younger son of Calligos Winterscale. At your service."

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，冯·瓦兰修斯大人！愿永恒的{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}泰拉{/g}光辉长存！”{n}你面前的年轻人彬彬有礼地向你鞠了一躬。随后，他挺起肩背，直视着你的眼睛。他的举止没有丝毫蔑视，而是充满了沉着与自信，这是直视平等之人的目光。{/n}“卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的幼子，艾维尼·温特斯凯尔，为您效劳。”

languages.text: 「ご機嫌よう、{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウス！永遠なる{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}の光が永劫に輝きますように！」{n}目の前の青年は、礼儀正しく完璧なお辞儀を披露する。ピンと背筋を伸ばしてこちらの目を見つめる彼の態度は反抗的ではなく、落ち着いた自信を滲ませていた。それは、対等な相手に向けるまなざしである。{/n}「俺はエヴァイン・ウィンタースケール。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの末の息子だ。よろしく頼む」
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, my greetings! May the light of eternal {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} shine forevermore!" {n}The young man before you offers an impeccably courteous bow. He then straightens his back and looks you in the eye, not as a show of defiance, but with cool confidence. It is a gaze with which one graces an equal.{/n} "Evayne Winterscale, younger son of Calligos Winterscale. At your service."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、ご機嫌よう！永遠なる{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}テラ{/g}の光がずっと輝きますように！」{n}目の前の青年は、礼儀正しく完璧なお辞儀を披露する。それからピンと背筋を伸ばしてコチラの目を見つめ、その態度は反抗的ではなく、落ち着いた自信を滲ませていた。青年は、対等な相手をキラキラした目で見つめている。{/n}「俺はエヴァイン・ウィンタースケール、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの下の息子だ。よろしく頼む」

「ご機嫌よう、{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウス！永遠なる{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}の光が永劫に輝きますように！」{n}目の前の青年は、礼儀正しく完璧なお辞儀を披露する。ピンと背筋を伸ばしてこちらの目を見つめる彼の態度は反抗的ではなく、落ち着いた自信を滲ませていた。それは、対等な相手に向けるまなざしである。{/n}「俺はエヴァイン・ウィンタースケール。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの末の息子だ。よろしく頼む」

languages.text: "Selamlar olsun {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius! Ebedî {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra'nın{/g} nuru sonsuza dek parlasın!" {n}Karşındaki genç adam, kusursuz bir kibarlıkla reverans yapıyor. Ardından sırtını dikleştiriyor ve meydan okurcasına değil, mağrur bir öz güvenle gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Ancak denk olarak gördüğün birine böyle bakabilirsin.{/n} "Bendeniz Calligos Winterscale'in küçük oğlu Evayne Winterscale, emrinize amadeyim."
languages.original_text: "{mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, my greetings! May the light of eternal {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} shine forevermore!" {n}The young man before you offers an impeccably courteous bow. He then straightens his back and looks you in the eye, not as a show of defiance, but with cool confidence. It is a gaze with which one graces an equal.{/n} "Evayne Winterscale, younger son of Calligos Winterscale. At your service."

traits.locale_text: "Selamlar olsun {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius! Ebedî {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}'nın nuru sonsuza dek parlasın!" {n}Karşındaki genç adam, kusursuz bir kibarlıkla reverans yapıyor. Ardından sırtını dikleştiriyor ve meydan okurcasına değil, mağrur bir öz güvenle gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Ancak denk olarak gördüğün birine böyle bakabilirsin.{/n} "Bendeniz Calligos Winterscale'in küçük oğlu Evayne Winterscale, emrinize amadeyim."
